## Code Blocks

An example code block using R code.

```{r}
x <- 1:10
y <- x^2
plot(x, y, type = "b", col = "blue", pch = 19,
     xlab = "X-axis", ylab = "Y-axis",
     main = "Example Plot")
summary(lm(y ~ x))
```
